reviews.name: George Studencu
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
We are happy to see your great 4* rating! Thanks for allowing us to be a part of your wonderful, memorable experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Kind Regards,
Hilton Sibiu

reviews.name: micmuntc
reviews.text: I enjoy that this hotel is a little bit removed from the center of Sibiu as it is quiet. There is plenty of parking out front. The room was very spacious and clean (it even had a bidet). We had the breakfast area to ourselves in the morning and there was quite the selection.
